replies.body:
My username came up from Warrior Cats (The book series) I had joined a roleplay group on Instagram, and the leader wouldn't let me have my original oc's name from years ago, so I changed the last part of it (Shadow to Storm) and Midnightstormz is now my Instagram username! Look me up :3
I have one dog. He is a Shetland Sheepdog that is 2 years old and FLUFFEH :D
I listen to Dubstep, Coldplay, Approaching Nirvana, Avicii, and much more :D
wat.
